resources.string: Identification of a person to be himself has been a historical concern. The persons today get identified by their PIN, passwords. But with the increasing insecure , where a person does not know when his ID card, password or signature will be stolen, there is an need for providing an identification system that recognize a person based on attributes that are impossible to steal. The Iris with its unique characteristics provides the errorless way of recognizing individuals. The Iris system uses a video based system to locate the Iris in the eye. The information of the Iris is then converted to the IrisCode, which then is compared with the stored IrisCode for the identification of the individual. The unique nature of the Iris guarantee that the individual is recognized to be himself. No two persons have the same Iris structure,not even the same personâ€™s two eyes have the same structure of

No, Funbayy only collects necessary information for the usability of app and for security purposes. \nLike Username and password for personal access and other optional info of email , phone_no for future addition of features. All the data is stored locally in your phone for now.

Nowadays almost every big production company is starting its own streaming service , because of which user are forced to pay for multiple streaming services. \nFunbayy was created as a collection of all movies and tv shows from different streaming services into a single application free of cost

Funbayy does not own or host any of the movies / Tvshows listed in this app. \It fetches the information available on the internet and shows it in this app.\nThis app is not made for commercial use and was intended as a hobby project/for personal use.

Currently there is no option for downloading whole season altogether as we ran into issues while implementing this feature.\n We are working on this feature and maybe this feature will be available soon..
There was no need to implement an another search bar for anime as anime movies / Tvshows can be searched in Movies / Tvshows search bar respectively

You may not be able to watch some of the listed content due to following reasons -
 
1) The movie/Tvshow is too old and so is not available 
2) Your Internet connection might be slow , Try refreshing the internet connection and reloading the content 
3) The movie has not released/just released and is not available on any streaming service 
4) The movie/Tvshow got taken down due to copyright violation from the hosting server
